text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly states that GILTI is a regime under Section 951A and describes it as a current inclusion regime that requires U.S. shareholders of CFCs to include their pro rata share of the CFC's tested income, which is the definition of GILTI category income.", "criterion_id": "8f1cb2b2-3aa9-4607-a3fa-b8380825bfa6"}
